features: Soft Bristles: The toothbrush has soft bristles for gentle cleaning and comfort.
Sonic Technology: The toothbrush uses sonic waves to clean teeth and gums more effectively.
Automatic Operation: The toothbrush operates automatically with a built-in timer and brushing mode.
Tongue Scraper: The toothbrush has a built-in tongue scraper to remove bacteria and plaque.
Metal Handle: The toothbrush has a durable metal handle for a comfortable grip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and Small
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for an electric toothbrush that won't wake the entire house up when I brushed my teeth at night and this is the one! I've had it for almost 6 months and have not replaced the battery yet. It's slim and so quiet - perfect when you have a baby sleeping right next to the bathroom. I love that it comes in this beautiful rose gold color and a travel case. I have yet to mount it to my mirror for easy access, but when I do, it's going to be so nice freeing up more counter space! Love this toothbrush!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for those who kick trips
reviews.reviewText: Great little toothbrush for when you don’t want to bring your home electric toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Toothbrush For Travel
reviews.reviewText: I just got back from a trip to Eastern Europe for 10 days. I used the Quip Adult electric toothbrush every am & pm. It worked beautifully! My teammates asked me what it was, and as I told them, their remark was, "That's really cool!" My biggest compliment is that it's really easy to pack, as less is more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the quip. I bought this as a replacement. I noticed these toothbrush do not last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Love Quip, Hated My unauthorized Reseller!
reviews.reviewText: Product is great. I have one and love it. Have bought some for others. This one was bought for a family member. I didn't realize it was sold by a 3rd party reseller. Not a big deal, until it fails. 8 months of use, and the motor shuts off randomly. No problem, contacted Quip for a warrantee claim, but was denied because the third-party reseller is NOT an authorized reseller! Thats odd. So I contacted the reseller who, of course told me to contact the manufacturer, or Amazon.I am grateful to Amazon that they finally made this right with me.However, it leads me to believe that the product I purchased MAY have been STOLEN. No, I can't prove it, but with all of the retail theft across the country these days, the stuff has to be resold somewhere. Why not set up a store on Amazon to sell random stuff.Be wary of the actual sellers you buy from on Amazon. I am sure there are many other storefronts on Amazon like, Z Essentials, trafficking in stolen goods. No, I cannot prove it, or dis-prove it. But, the fact that Quip does not have them listed as an authorized vendor certainly makes me suspicious.Also, Quip, while trying to protect their supply chain, may also be inadvertently losing customers. If I'm buying replacement brushes for the toothbrush, you have a subscriber and scheduled income. Now, I have a faulty product, within a year of purchasing it, but will now most likely throw away. Now you have lost a customer. Is that a smart business practice?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Travel Companion
reviews.reviewText: frequent traveler, finding a toothbrush that combines convenience, effectiveness, and style can be quite a challenge. However, I recently discovered the Quip Adult Toothbrush, and I must say, it has become my go-to travel companion for maintaining oral hygiene on the go.One of the standout features of the Quip Adult Toothbrush is its sleek and compact design, specifically tailored for travel ease. The slim and lightweight handle makes it incredibly portable, fitting effortlessly into my toiletry bag or even my pocket. This compact size ensures that I never have to compromise on packing space while still having a reliable toothbrush at hand.

This comes in a weird plastic tube, without the required accessories. I, not sure what scam the seller is uptown, but don’t trust this. After all the negative reviews, don’t trust Amazon Rondell you something like this, either.As for the actual quip, enjoy commuting to a forced subscription if you ever want replacement heads. Enjoy discarding batteries too - it’s not rechargeable. The concept is good, but those aspects, combined with this fraudulent sale, made me pay double for a similar amaze brush from the trusted vendor.
